pr_title: GH-2009 Update to java 13 for Github Actions

timeline.bodyText:
Is this a change we need? From your comments I got the impression you merely tried to use this to fix some test failures - or were those different test failures?
If we don't need this for Java 13, let's roll it back so we can merge this independently of the Elasticsearch version bump.
Edit never mind, just had a look at the build failure history, and there were other tests failing as well that this fixes. So it's necessary.
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

timeline.message:
update elasticsearch version to see if this makes tests pass

Signed-off-by: Håvard Ottestad <hmottestad@gmail.com>
GH-2009 removing final modifier unnecessary and causes error in Java 13
GH-2009 removing final modifier unnecessary and causes error in Java 13

Sync ES version used for testing to the one we are now using in develop

Signed-off-by: Håvard Ottestad <hmottestad@gmail.com>
